mapper.select: /* USE : MobileProdSaleMapper.getMultiStoreList */ SELECT C.MULTISTORE_CD, C.STORE_CD, D.STORE_NM FROM ( SELECT B.MULTISTORE_CD, B.STORE_CD FROM TB_MS_MULTISTORE_DTL A, TB_MS_MULTISTORE_DTL B WHERE A.HQ_OFFICE_CD = #{hqOfficeCd} AND A.STORE_CD = #{storeCd} AND B.HQ_OFFICE_CD = A.HQ_OFFICE_CD AND B.MULTISTORE_CD = A.MULTISTORE_CD GROUP BY B.MULTISTORE_CD, B.STORE_CD ) C, TB_MS_STORE D WHERE D.STORE_CD = C.STORE_CD AND C.MULTISTORE_CD = ( SELECT MULTISTORE_CD FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT MULTISTORE_CD, REGEXP_SUBSTR(MULTISTORE_USER_ID,'[^,]+', 1, LEVEL) AS MULTISTORE_USER_ID FROM (SELECT MULTISTORE_CD, MULTISTORE_USER_ID FROM TB_MS_MULTISTORE_HDR WHERE USE_YN = 'Y') CONNECT BY LEVEL <= LENGTH(REGEXP_REPLACE(MULTISTORE_USER_ID,'[^,]+')) + 1 ) WHERE MULTISTORE_USER_ID = #{userId} ) ORDER BY C.STORE_CD
